Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Milestones.Committee: Veterans, Homeland Security And Military Affairs

Actions.Text: REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS
REFERRED TO VETERANS, HOMELAND SECURITY AND MILITARY AFFAIRS

Title: Relates to authorizing a local government to override a state disaster emergency in all or part of the territorial limits of such local government
Summary: Authorizes a county, city, town or village to override a governor's declaration of a state disaster emergency in all or part of the territorial limits of such local government.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to authorizing a county, city, town or village to override a state disaster emergency in all or part of the territorial limits of such local government
